text: John Gordon Elliott (5 November 1938 – 12 July 2022) was a New Zealand politician. He was a member of the National Party. He was a member of the New Zealand House of Representatives from 1975 to 1981. He was born in Whangārei, New Zealand. Elliott died on 12 July 2022 in Auckland, New Zealand at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2022 deaths Category:New Zealand politicians
title: John Elliott (New Zealand politician)
